title: Im putting my entire life in danger by writing this ...
body:
But I know the story needs to get out. And it will. And I don't know what is going on yet, but I will find out and I'll keep you guys posted. I can't write it as soon as it happens - I can feel that they are watching me. But you need to know just in case. I'm fully aware that they are capable of killing me.

...

No one noticed what happened. It was in broad daylight, but they were fast. I just so happened to see the car get a flat while I was walking out of the park. It wasn't weird at all to see that family get a flat but watching a man in his thirties walk up to the dad and stab his neck with a needle made me stay in the park.

I hid behind a tree and then moved towards some bushes so that I could get a better view. The dad was drugged I think. Or poisoned. I couldn't really tell. The mom came out to check on him, and the killer's wife? slit her throat from one end to the other. There were two kids in the car, one was like 5 and the other was probably 14. She killed them mercilessly. She didn't even look phased by the fact that they were kids.

They packed the bodies neatly in their car and drove off. I didn't know what to do guys. I watched this happen and they seemed trained. At some point, I heard them speaking Russian. I'm scared. I don't think they saw me, but I literally just saw an entire family get murdered. I was so scared.

I ran home. But then, right across the street from my house, I found the car again. Just sitting in front of the house that was marked sold just last week. I remember being filled with dread then.

The killer's wife walked out, now wearing a sundress and a friendly smile on her face. That was the moment that I made a choice.

[I have a schizophrenia, so I know no one will believe me 😞 even though I've been taking my meds on time and every day- scout's honor.]

I walked up to the house, smiled and greeted her.

"Welcome to Ocean City, I'm Jay. where are you guys coming from?"

"I'm Martha. My family and I just moved from Texas. My husband actually got a promotion in his job. We are so excited. You look as though you're almost my William's age – maybe you two should hang out!”

It was weird talking to her now. She didn't have the slightest accent now. She had one earlier. I remember being super freaked that the Russian spies were killing an entire family.

Just as I was contemplating that, a boy just about the age the other walked out of the house...

"Hey I'm Willy"

The timing was too perfect. It Made me all the more suspicious, but that could be because I just saw this woman kill two kids and their mom. ”Hey Willy – I’m Jay. Just came over to welcome you guys to the neighborhood.” ”awesome. Well, we are still working on unpacking. Maybe when we are finished we can hang out”

I was so curious that I almost said yes, but then I remembered that the goal of that day was not to die so I kindly declined.

”aw man, I wish I could. But I have to go to school early tomorrow.”

”what school do you go to?” his mom questioned. Not even in a friendly way. More like an I better give her the answer she wanted to hear.

”I go to Kennedy- it’s ten minutes away but it’s a good school.”

“it must be fate”, she said with a smirk. “That’s the school William was enrolled in”

“yeah man, that means we can just hang out at school tomorrow!”
author: justanobodywholoves
